jobs.title: Salesforce Commerce Cloud Developer
jobs.summary: Salesforce Commerce Cloud Developer at Compass.uol. Working with Salesforce B2C to create e-commerce platforms.

clients.name: Enterprise Mobility & Services Client
clients.summary: Contributed to a seamless migration of e-commerce functionalities from a legacy VTEX platform to Salesforce Commerce Cloud B2C for a large mobility and services provider. Built and deployed partnership landing pages, connected partnership systems by developing API connections to validate client cards with external partners, and developed the new billing payment page with API integration and automated PDF document generation. Created reusable and dynamic components for the SFCC Page Designer, empowering non-technical users to efficiently build and customize storefront experiences.

jobs.title: Teaching and Monitoring Scholarship in Curricular Component
jobs.summary: Part-time position at the GEIHC - Human-Computer Interaction Study Group. Participated in meetings, supported the development of Open Seminars, promoted group activities, conducted directed studies, led workshops, performed literature review, contributed to the creation of educational materials, submitted experience reports, and prepared activity reports.

jobs.title: Front-End Development Internship
jobs.summary: Internship focused on Front-End Development (React) with a focus on AWS Cloud context at Compass.UOL. Responsibilities include enhancing skills in front-end development, working with technologies like React and AWS, and contributing to the creation of innovative applications.

items.title: Semiotic Framework Tool
items.description: A web-based participatory framework tool that implements the Semiotic Ladder framework proposed by Ronald Stamper, integrated with Pressman's Software Engineering Layers. This tool facilitates the development of educational software through structured semiotic modeling and participatory design approaches.

items.title: FitMe - Food Delivery App
items.description: A full-stack food delivery application featuring restaurant browsing, menu management, and user authentication. This project was developed as a learning exercise to practice React, TypeScript, and API integration skills.

items.title: FitMe Backend
items.description: GraphQL backend service for the FitMe food delivery application, managing restaurants, dishes, and categories. Built as a learning project to explore Spring Boot, GraphQL, and JPA.

items.title: Folio Agency
items.description: A responsive portfolio website for a creative agency showcasing services, works, and job listings. Created as a learning project to practice HTML and CSS layout techniques.

items.title: Task Tracker API
items.description: A RESTful API for managing task lists and individual tasks with CRUD operations. Developed as a learning project to practice Spring Boot, REST API design, and database management.
